element.name: Super
element.definition: The root of all data elements.

element.name: AddressPrivateMailboxText
element.definition: A private mailbox within a company.

element.name: ContactEmailID
element.definition: An electronic mailing address by which a person or organization may be contacted.

element.name: DeviceReceivedEmail
element.definition: An email message received by a computer.

element.name: DeviceSentEmail
element.definition: An email message sent from a computer.

element.name: Email
element.definition: An electronic form of communication that can be exchanged asynchronously.

element.name: EmailAttachment
element.definition: A file which is sent along with an email message.

element.name: EmailAttachmentBinary
element.definition: A binary file which is attached to an email message.

element.name: EmailAttachmentDocument
element.definition: A document which is attached to an email message.

element.name: EmailAttachmentImage
element.definition: An image file which is attached to an email message.

element.name: EmailID
element.definition: An identifier that references an email message.

element.name: EmailMessageText
element.definition: A body or main content of an email message.

element.name: EmailReceivedDate
element.definition: A date on which an email message is received.

element.name: EmailRecipient
element.definition: A recipient of an email message.

element.name: EmailRecipientAddressID
element.definition: An email address of a recipient of an email message.

element.name: EmailRecipientEntity
element.definition: An entity which receives an email message.

element.name: EmailRecipientName
element.definition: A name of an entity which receives an email message.

element.name: EmailSender
element.definition: A sender of an email message.

element.name: EmailSenderEntity
element.definition: An entity which sends an email message.

element.name: EmailSenderName
element.definition: A name of an entity which sends an email message.

element.name: EmailSentDate
element.definition: A date on which an email message is sent.

element.name: EmailSubjectText
element.definition: A summary of the contents on an email message.
